data.title: Oh the lines
data.text: It does not matter what time of day I go to this Panda. The lines are always ridiculous!  Inside and the drive thru. I don't know why they are so slow!  The food is always delicious and the servings are enough to feed small armies but the lines!!  A lot of times they are waiting on more food to cook and I get that. The service is friendly and sometimes they will give us a free drink for waiting. It is also pretty clean and in a crazy busy location. I would recommend going if you are not in any hurry.

data.title: Not bad, fills the gap
data.text: The food is good and quite a variety, my mistake was arriving just at closing so I had to settle for the food that was left.   It was tasty but tired and suffered somewhat from exposure but it did fill the gap.  I want to try again with better timing on my part.

data.title: Very Good!
data.text: Have never eaten there and had the chance to during business trip. The locals really love it and now so do I. Portions are good size and tasty.

data.title: Always great Orange Chicken
data.text: I also like the teriyaki chicken. With a school sponsored coupon, we get a third meat free. Just enough for two people. We like the noodles instead of rice also.

data.title: It's a Buffett
data.text: For a Buffett, it was pretty good. The lo mien was dry. Selection was limited. But, what they had was pretty good. It is a franchise fast food house.

data.title: Best Chinese take out food in our area
data.text: I love Chinese food and prefer to go sit down to eat when time allows but when we want take out food the Panda Express is always our first choice. We get it at least once a month or more.

data.title: Hot & Ready
data.text: The food is excellent and if you are unsure whether or not you will like something, they are always willing to give you a sample.
